span.data-source: Specifies whether this structure is uninitialized.
span.sentencetext: 指定是否這 Color 結構尚未初始化。

span.data-source: Gets a value indicating whether this structure is a predefined color.
span.sentencetext: 取得值，指出是否這 Color 結構是預先定義的色彩。

span.data-source: Predefined colors are represented by the elements of the enumeration.
span.sentencetext: 預先定義之的色彩由的項目 KnownColor 列舉型別。

span.data-source: Gets a value indicating whether this structure is a named color or a member of the enumeration.
span.sentencetext: 取得值，指出是否這 Color 結構是具名的色彩或成員的 KnownColor 列舉型別。

span.data-source: Gets a value indicating whether this structure is a system color.
span.sentencetext: 取得值，指出是否這 Color 結構是系統色彩。

span.data-source: A system color is a color that is used in a Windows display element.
span.sentencetext: 系統色彩會是 Windows 顯示項目使用的色彩。

span.data-source: System colors are represented by elements of the enumeration.
span.sentencetext: 系統色彩由項目的 KnownColor 列舉型別。
